content: huggable worsted booties keep those tiny feet warm and kicking in these quick-knit booties knit flat with a seam up the back you probably have enough dk yarn in your stash makes a welcome and personal baby shower gift sizes 1 month 3 months bootie foot length 1 month 9 cm 3 5 3 months 10 cm 4 materials needles and notions 3 25mm us 3 needles or size needed to obtain gauge 2 75mm us 2 needles yarn needle yarn 50 60 metres 55 66 yards suggested yarn any worsted weight yarn will fit the measurements gauge 18 sts stocking stitch 10cm 4 on 3 25mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge page 1 ©hushimcounting 2022 find hushimcounting designs at @hushimcounting on instagram at https //www ravelry com/stores/hushimcounting- designs or at https //www lovecrafts com instructions cast on 27 31 sts with 3 25mm us 3 needles row 1 3 5 7 knit row 2 k1 m1 k12 14 m1 k1 m1 k12 14 m1 k1 row 4 k2 m1 k12 14 m1 k3 m1 k12 14 m1 k2 row 6 k3 m1 k12 14 m1 k5 m1 k12 14 m1 k3 row 8 k4 m1 k12 14 m1 k7 m1 k12 14 m1 k4 row 9-16 knit row 17 k25 27 ssk turn row 18 sl1 p7 p2tog turn row 19 sl1 k7 ssk turn repeat row 18 and 19 4 6 times 34 sts next row sl1 p7 p2tog k to eor 33 sts change to 2 75mm us2 needles row 1 knit row 2 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 row 3 sl1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to eor row 4 sl1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last st k1 repeat these last two row 8 10 more times cast off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bindoff see tutorials on youtube to finish sew up the back and foot seam turn over cuff abbreviations eor end of round k knit m1 insert the right-hand needle tip from front to back under the bar between the stitches and knit it p purl p2tog purl 2 sts together sl1 slip 1 st ssk sl1 k1 pass slipped stitch over st/sts stitch/stitches page 2 ©hushimcounting 2022 find hushimcounting designs at @hushimcounting on instagram at https //www ravelry com/stores/hushimcounting- designs or at https //www lovecrafts com
